name: The Pyrite Talisman
storyline:
Telluria is an ancient world bound to a terrible curse by an angry Overgod.
Annelise lives in the year 2100. In a burning flame, one morning like many others, she glimpses a female figure absolutely identical to her.
From that moment her life will change.
She'll have to know why she can see the other her but she can't speak to her.
She'll have to search for informations on ancient tomes.
She'll have to solve puzzles and pass trials.
She'll have to learn how to harness ancient powers.
And in the meantime she will learn about the existence of a prophecy, of an angry Supreme God, of the arrival of Four Plagues dooming the world.

She will understand to be part of something totally unexpected and too big for her to manage.

And that somewhere in time, she is not alone.
summary: The Pyrite Talisman is a 3D graphic adventure involving exploration in third person direct movement, puzzle solving and inventory use through a point & click interface. During gameplay the player will play with two characters switching through time to collect informations to progress further into the story.
